Items.Title: Application number C 240157 MMX (Bronx Metro-North Station Area Study) submitted by the New York City Department of City Planning pursuant to Sections 197-c and 199 of the New York City Charter and Section 5-430 et seq. of the New York City Administrative Code for an amendment to the City Map involving the elimination, discontinuance, and closing of a portion of Unionport Road between East Tremont Avenue and Guerlain Street and the adjustment of grades and block dimensions necessitated thereby; including authorization for any acquisition or disposition of real property related thereto, in accordance with Map No. 13153 dated January 20, 2024 and signed by the Borough President, Borough of the Bronx, Community Districts 9, 10 & 11, Council Districts 13, 17, and 18.
